author: Andreas
content:
I guess there's not much of a conflict yet. I suppose your nature shots were taken at a higher f-stop, maybe f5.6 or f8. The lens is superb at that apertures, it's only below f2.8 that it is problematic, and then only when there are blown point lights. The problem is, that I frequently use my lenses under such extreme conditions.
